Squizzy::

"Don't worry about that now. Your in bad shape and need to focus on 
getting fixed up. Don't worry, you'll be safe. Just get fixed and 
I'll answer all your questions when you get out."  She shut the doors 
and turned on the CR chamber.  She looked over at Lady Hawk. "Well, 
another bot for the metal grinder just walked in."  She sighed. "You 
know, the more I think about it, the more I like your idea of making 
the bots to better suit  the eco system around here. but even with 
the perfect body, it's the mond of the bot that makes me cringe. How 
can we make a bot's mind so he or she will be nature oriented?"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Nighteyes looked at Squizzy just before she entered the CR 
chamber. "Who 
> is your leader, exactly? I dont even know what ship Im in."
> 
>     Aracnia entered the base, she didnt see Cyber Claw when she 
left, but she 
> would send a transmission to her ass oon as she got to the bridge. 
She 
> entered and saw her crew busy at work. Rampage, Tankkor, 
Tarantulas, 
> Paralysis, Aerostreak, and of course he beloved Quickstrike.
>     "Well Commander Quickstrike, things went as planned. Soon we 
will be 
> united...and a council will be established on Earth for the 
Predacons."
>     She walked around the room, and sent the message to Cyber Claw 
to come as 
> quickly as possible for a briefing. Cyber Claw was an asset to the 
team, and 
> he role would be Information Officer, as in getting and delivering 
top secret 
> information. Mainly agianst the Maximlas, the Predacons sworn 
enemies.
